page.title: 19CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: LISA AND HELEN WENT OUT TO SEE WHICH GAMES THE INFANTS WERE PLAYING. WE DIVIDED THEM INTO BOYS' GAMES, GIRLS' GAMES AND MIXED GAMES. THESE ARE SOME OF THE GAMES THE{BOYS WERE PLAYING: RUNNING, CARS, CLIMBING AND 40_40. 40_40 IS A GAME LIKE HIDE AND SEEK BUT YOU COUNT TO 40 AND WHEN YOU TOUCH THE POST YOU SAY "40_40 IN". THESE ARE SOME OF THE{GIRLS'}GAMES: IN AND OUT THE WINDOWS, SKIPPING, SCHOOL, RING A RING O' ROSES AND SINGING. IN AND OUT THE WINDOWS IS WHEN SOMEONE GOES IN AND OUT OF PEOPLE SINGING A SONG. WHO THE PERSON STOPS AT THEN GOES ON WITH THEM IN AND OUT OF THE PEOPLE. THESE ARE SOME OF THE{MIXED}GAMES: BULLDOGS, HOUSES, CHASING AND TRAINS.
